cause.description:
Science has to be promoted by promoting its underlying rational ideology. This ideology could be promoted by teaching people scientific and research methodologies, by simplfying science & its philosophy and by uncovering the true explanantory power of science. Moreover, rational thinking could be promoted by coaching young people to critically analyze what is happening around them. All activities has to end up promoting open mindness and tolerance that are the core scientific ethics. Deep understanding for science and its empirical tools will prevent theologically driven interpretations for science...
1. Scientific methodology is the most rational and reliable method to explain nature
2. Science rationality promote tolerance and mutual understanding
3. Science is a way for personal and collective development
cause.name: Scientific Methodology
